name: GRO (lunkums)
description:
Notice The browser (WebGL/HTML5) version of this game will not work in Chromium-based browsers such as Google Chrome or Edge. You must either use Mozilla Firefox or install the executable version. A fix for this is in the works. About
  • Players: 1
  • Playing Time: 15-45 Min
  • Ages: 13+
  • Release Date: February 6th, 2023
Description Will you blossom or crash into the abyss?
GRO is a 2.5D rage platformer set in a desolate future where humanity has destroyed itself and almost all other life on Earth. You are a plant growing towards the surface, trying to restore nature and recover from the damage created by the human race.
Features
  • Play as a growing flower
  • Easy-to-learn gameplay; only two buttons
  • Explore a desolate world ravaged by humanity
  • Charming abstract visuals with an enchanting 2.5D style
Credits
  • Designed by Aidan Flannery and Luke “Lunkums” Leedy
  • Programmed by Luke “Lunkums” Leedy
  • Art made by Aidan Flannery
  • Music made by Lorelai Woodburn
  • Made with Unity Game Engine
  • Sound effects made by FilmCow
